channel.title: CVE Feed for Sonaar Music -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sonaar Music -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-30530|2024-03-31T20:07:00.558Z -- Sonaar Music -- MP3 Audio Player for Music, Radio & Podcast by Sonaar
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Sonaar Music MP3 Audio Player for Music, Radio & Podcast by Sonaar allows Stored XSS.This issue affects MP3 Audio Player for Music, Radio & Podcast by Sonaar: from n/a through 5.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-30487|2024-03-29T13:41:07.322Z -- Sonaar Music -- MP3 Audio Player for Music, Radio & Podcast by Sonaar
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Sonaar Music MP3 Audio Player for Music, Radio & Podcast by Sonaar.This issue affects MP3 Audio Player for Music, Radio & Podcast by Sonaar: from n/a through 5.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-31343|2024-04-10T16:12:14.112Z -- Sonaar Music -- MP3 Audio Player for Music, Radio & Podcast by Sonaar
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Sonaar Music MP3 Audio Player for Music, Radio & Podcast by Sonaar.This issue affects MP3 Audio Player for Music, Radio & Podcast by Sonaar: from n/a through 4.10.1.
